entry.tran: 英国的；英国人的；英国文化的
entry.def: British means belonging or relating to the United Kingdom, or to its people or culture.
The British are the people of Great Britain.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of Great Britain or its people or culture;

sentences.en: Her efforts were justly rewarded with a British Empire Medal.

sentences.en: British companies are subject to international laws and the same applies to companies in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英国的公司要遵守国际法，这同样适用于欧洲的公司。

sentences.en: British voters are rightly suspicious of attempts to save money in the area of education.

sentences.en: Her trainer was even more gloomy about the prospects for British tennis.
